text: The Battle of Canusium was an engagement during the Social War. The Roman force had won a string of victories, winning multiple sieges including one at Cannae. A rebel force now engaged him in battle and he was forced to retreat, both sides suffering heavy casualties. ==References== Category:Battles involving the Roman Republic Category:89 BC Category:80s BC conflicts Category:1st century BC in the Roman Republic
title: Battle of Canusium (89 BC)
